article_title: Pediatric Clinic to close in October
article_text:

article_metadata.author: Lyxan Toledanes / The Daily News

og.description: After 50 years of caring for the community’s children, the Pediatric Clinic in Longview will close Oct. 21, citing difficulties recruiting doctors to the area.
